tool_description: Full suite of calls to make use of Xperience body measuring backend.
name: Xperience Shopping Body Scanning
title: Xperience Shopping Body Scanning

api_list.name: Start a new measurement process with a new user- Get a request id (Step1)
api_list.description:
Get a request_id for a new scanning process by either
 **A.** Submitting a browser session as a request id or
 **B.** Requesting a brand new id
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://xperience-shopping-body-scanning.p.rapidapi.com/measurements/request"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "xperience-shopping-body-scanning.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://xperience-shopping-body-scanning.p.rapidapi.com/measurements/request"

api_list.name: GetalistofallmeasurementrequestswiththisAPIKey.Youcannotseetheactualmeasurementsonthisendpoint.
api_list.description: Get a list of all measurement requsts object belonging to the {ApiKey}. You can select which page and wether to show only calculated meausurement requests from scans via query parameters.

optional_parameters.name: calculation_finished
optional_parameters.description: Return only requests with calculated measurements True/False

api_list.name: Startabatchofmanynewmeasurementsprocessesatonce(Step1).
api_list.description: Register an entire batch of (max 25) measurement intents at once.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://xperience-shopping-body-scanning.p.rapidapi.com/measurements/batch_request/68076756"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "xperience-shopping-body-scanning.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://xperience-shopping-body-scanning.p.rapidapi.com/measurements/batch_request/{amount}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "xperience-shopping-body-scanning.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Getmanualmademeasurementsthatweresentandfedbacktothealgorithm.
api_list.description: Retrieve the manual made measurements previously sent to feed back to the algorithm for the specified {request_id}. The measurement extraction algorithm is continously re-trained and is able to learn from the manual measurements feedback.

required_parameters.name: request_id
required_parameters.description: (Required) ID of the *request* to retrieve recommendations for

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://xperience-shopping-body-scanning.p.rapidapi.com/measurements/manualEntry/Excepteur deserunt eu"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "xperience-shopping-body-scanning.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://xperience-shopping-body-scanning.p.rapidapi.com/measurements/manualEntry/{request_id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "xperience-shopping-body-scanning.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

api_list.name: Getalistofallmeasurementrequests&bodymeasurementswiththisAPIKey.OnlyAPI-keyswithelevatedpriviligescanaccessthisendpoint.
api_list.description: Get a list of all measurements objects (requests + body measurements) belonging to the {ApiKey}. You can select which page and wether to show only calculated meausurement requests from scans via query parameters. Only API-keys with elevated priviliges can access this endpoint.

required_parameters.name: calculation_finished
required_parameters.description: Return only requests with calculated measurements True/False

api_list.name: Pollformeasurementsafterreceivinga{request_id}.OnlyAPI-keyswithelevatedpriviligescanseethebodymeasurements.
api_list.description: Get measurements object belonging to the {request_id}, if the video is valid and measurments can be calculated, the **video_valid** flag will be set to true. After the measurements are already calculated the flag **"calculation_finished"** will also be set to true. You can poll this endpoint to figure out when the measurments are ready (Prerequisite for Size Recommendation). Only API-keys with elevated priviliges can see the body measurements.

required_parameters.name: request_id
required_parameters.description: (Required) ID of the request to return

api_list.code:

url = "https://xperience-shopping-body-scanning.p.rapidapi.com/measurements/Excepteur deserunt eu"

            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "xperience-shopping-body-scanning.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
